# A.1.

Let \(\lambda' = \lambda\exp(\beta x)\). Then:

\begin{align*}
    & S(t|x) \\
    =& S_0(t)^{\exp(\beta x)} \\
    =& \exp(-\lambda t^k)^{\exp(\beta x)} \\
    =& \exp(-\lambda t^k\exp(\beta x)) \\
    =& \exp(-\lambda\exp(\beta x) t^k) \\
    =& \exp(-\lambda' t^k) \\
\end{align*}

which has the form of a Weibull distribution with shape parameter $k$ and scale parameter $\lambda'$.
